attributes.action: Withdraw the current London 2012 Olympics logo and ask the people of the UK to vote on a replacement.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why not ask an advertising firm to come up with several options and then allow people to vote for it on the London 2012 olympics website? That way there will be public consultation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
